Apologies if this is off-topic, but we've been talking about testing 
singletons here, and I thought it might be good to take a second to look 
at the special quality that makes singletons beautiful, and then be 
scared, very scared.

http://beautifulcode.oreillynet.com/2007/07/the_inner_beauty_of_singleton.php

Michael Feathers
